steps.title: Yin and yang represent opposite but complementary forces.
steps.content: Yin and yang represent opposite but complementary forces. Yin is described as the force that provides spirit to things, while yang gives form to every individual object. Yin is soft while yang is hard. Theyâ€™re complete opposites, but thatâ€™s how they bring balance to the universe. [1] X Research source Yin: represents feminine energy, black, darkness, north, water (transformation), passiveness, the moon, the earth, cold, old, even numbers, and valleys. Yang: represents masculine energy, white, light, south, fire (creativity), activeness, the sun, heaven, warmth, odd numbers, and mountains. Do you relate more to the "yin" or "yang" energy? If you feel drawn to one, and your close friend or partner reminds you of the other, that's a good sign that you two have achieved a yin and yang dynamic.

steps.title: The philosophy of yin and yang states that all things coexist with their opposites.
steps.content: The philosophy of yin and yang states that all things coexist with their opposites. This is a fundamental concept in Chinese philosophy, dating back all the way to the 3rd century BCE, or even earlier. The yin-yang symbol is a circle divided into a black section and a white section. These represent the idea of opposites existing in harmonyâ€”light and dark, masculine and feminine, good and evil, and so on. [2] X Research source Each side of the yin and yang symbol has a small dot of the opposite color, symbolizing how no one side is superior to the other, and they need each other to be whole.

So in order to create this harmony and make it last, donâ€™t be afraid to just be yourself . [3] X Research source You can't force a yin and yang dynamic by acting how you think you should act. For you to truly complement one another, you both need to be your authentic selves.

steps.title: Accept each other's differences.
steps.content: Accept each other's differences. The whole philosophy behind yin and yang says that things can be totally opposite of one another and still work beautifully together. When someone's different from you, it's easy to notice all the things that annoy you. But instead, you should focus on the way they teach you and care for you in unexpected (but needed) ways. [4] X Research source Maybe your partner is disorganzied, while you need a strict plan. Instead of focusing on how frustrating it is when they lose their keys (again), appreciate the fact that their unpredictable nature makes you a more flexible, relaxed person overall.
